verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> if thou wilt receive אֲמָרָ֑י <S%H561><s%> my words וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments תִּצְפֹּ֥ן <S%H6845><s%> and hide אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> within

לְהַקְשִׁ֣יב <S%H7181><s%> So that thou incline לַֽחָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> unto wisdom אָזְנֶ֑ךָ <S%H241><s%> thine ear תַּטֶּ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> [and] apply לִ֝בְּךָ֗ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart לַתְּבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> to understanding

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For אִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> if לַבִּינָ֣ה <S%H998><s%> after knowledge תִקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> Yea if thou criest לַ֝תְּבוּנָ֗ה <S%H8394><s%> for understanding תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> [and] liftest up קוֹלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תְּבַקְשֶׁ֥נָּה <S%H1245><s%> If thou seekest כַכָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> her as silver וְֽכַמַּטְמוֹנִ֥ים <S%H4301><s%> for her as [for] hid treasures תַּחְפְּשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <S%H2664><s%> and searchest

אָ֗ז <S%H227><s%> Then תָּ֭בִין <S%H995><s%> Then shalt thou understand יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> the fear יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְדַ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> the knowledge אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> of God תִּמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> and find

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom מִ֝פִּ֗יו <S%H6310><s%> out of his mouth דַּ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> [cometh] knowledge וּתְבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> and understanding

[וְצָפַן כ] (יִצְפֹּ֣ן <S%H6845><s%> reserve ק) לַ֭יְשָׁרִים <S%H3477><s%> for the righteous תּוּשִׁיָּ֑ה <S%H8454><s%> sound wisdom מָ֝גֵ֗ן <S%H4043><s%> [he is] a buckler לְהֹ֣לְכֵי <S%H1980><s%> to them that walk תֹֽם׃ <S%H8537><s%> uprightly

לִ֭נְצֹר <S%H5341><s%> He keepeth אָרְח֣וֹת <S%H734><s%> the paths מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> of judgment וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way [חֲסִידֹו כ] (חֲסִידָ֣יו <S%H2623><s%> godly ק) יִשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> and preserveth

אָ֗ז <S%H227><s%> Then תָּ֭בִין <S%H995><s%> Then shalt thou understand צֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment וּ֝מֵישָׁרִ֗ים <S%H4339><s%> and equity כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מַעְגַּל־ <S%H4570><s%> path טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> [yea] every good

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> entereth חָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> When wisdom בְלִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> into thine heart וְ֝דַ֗עַת <S%H1847><s%> and knowledge לְֽנַפְשְׁךָ֥ <S%H5315><s%> unto thy soul יִנְעָֽם׃ <S%H5276><s%> is pleasant
מְ֭זִמָּה <S%H4209><s%> Discretion תִּשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> shall preserve עָלֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and תְּבוּנָ֥ה <S%H8394><s%> thee understanding תִנְצְרֶֽכָּה׃ <S%H5341><s%> shall keep

לְ֭הַצִּ֣ילְךָ <S%H5337><s%> To deliver מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee from the way רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> of the evil מֵ֝אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [man] from the man מְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that speaketh תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <S%H8419><s%> froward things

הַ֭עֹ֣זְבִים <S%H5800><s%> Who leave אָרְח֣וֹת <S%H734><s%> the paths יֹ֑שֶׁר <S%H3476><s%> of uprightness לָ֝לֶ֗כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk בְּדַרְכֵי־ <S%H1870><s%> in the ways חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness

הַ֭שְּׂמֵחִים <S%H8056><s%> Who rejoice לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil יָ֝גִ֗ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> [and] delight בְּֽתַהְפֻּכ֥וֹת <S%H8419><s%> in the frowardness רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Whose אָרְחֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H734><s%> Whose ways עִקְּשִׁ֑ים <S%H6141><s%> [are] crooked וּ֝נְלוֹזִ֗ים <S%H3868><s%> and [they] froward בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4570><s%> in their paths

לְ֭הַצִּ֣ילְךָ <S%H5337><s%> To deliver מֵאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> woman זָרָ֑ה <S%H2114><s%> thee from the strange מִ֝נָּכְרִיָּ֗ה <S%H5237><s%> [even] from the stranger אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ <S%H561><s%> with her words הֶחֱלִֽיקָה׃ <S%H2505><s%> [which] flattereth

הַ֭עֹזֶבֶת <S%H5800><s%> Which forsaketh אַלּ֣וּף <S%H441><s%> the guide נְעוּרֶ֑יהָ <S%H5271><s%> of her youth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant אֱלֹהֶ֣יהָ <S%H430><s%> of her God שָׁכֵֽחָה׃ <S%H7911><s%> and forgetteth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֣חָה <S%H7743><s%> inclineth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> unto death בֵּיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> For her house וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רְ֝פָאִ֗ים <S%H7496><s%> unto the dead מַעְגְּלֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H4570><s%> and her paths

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> who בָּ֭אֶיהָ <S%H935><s%> None that go לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְשׁוּב֑וּן <S%H7725><s%> unto her return again וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַ֝שִּׂ֗יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> neither take they hold אָרְח֥וֹת <S%H734><s%> of the paths חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of life

לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> So תֵּ֭לֵךְ <S%H1980><s%> will walk בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> of good וְאָרְח֖וֹת <S%H734><s%> the paths צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> [men] and keep

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יְשָׁרִ֥ים <S%H3477><s%> For the upright יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים <S%H8549><s%> and the perfect יִוָּ֥תְרוּ <S%H3498><s%> shall remain בָֽהּ׃

וּ֭רְשָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> But the wicked מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth יִכָּרֵ֑תוּ <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off וּ֝בוֹגְדִ֗ים <S%H898><s%> and the transgressors יִסְּח֥וּ <S%H5255><s%> shall be rooted out מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H4480><s%> at פ
